DOC.brief_title: Antibody Production Following H1N1 Influenza Vaccination After Stem Cell and Heart Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: Stem cell and and heart transplant patients will receive pandemic H1N1 influenza vaccination according to the clinical guidelines. Two doses will be given, in 3-week interval. In these patients we will measure the specific antibody production. Blood sample 5 ml will be drawn before the first vaccine, before the second, and 3-4 weeks after the 2nd dose.
DOC.criteria: Stem cell and and heart transplant patients who will receive pandemic H1N1 influenza vaccination according to the clinical guidelines. Patients with unstable grafts.
DOC.keyword: Stem cell and and heart transplant patients who will receive pandemic H1N1 influenza vaccinations
